title: Bronze Team
body:
Hi, I'm creating a 5v5 team and need interested people to join.
Only looking for friendly players and will not tolerate hassling of other members.
You need to be prepared to play 2 different positions and will be recruited based on your preference.

So post your two favourite positions if you want to join and Ill add you to the team.
Have to play daily also and be serious about climbing the ranks.

*EDIT*
Still Looking for more.

replies.body:
still looking for more...

Does that mean those of us that havent been contacted in game  are of no interest to you?
Hey i play most nights, main top and mid but happy to learn any roll.
hi there, im an adc/support than can play mid and top. Im active day and night and would look forward to duo q during the day with other team members
Hi, I'll join. Jungle and ADC preferences.

hey dont know if you are full or not, but im a mid/ sup/ adc main, so happy to join if there is  a spot going! 
champ pool: Nid, Lux, Kalista, Varus, Karma, Annie, Ezreal (willing to learn extra if needed) 
Have voice coms, willing to DL any program needed!

Jungle Main Then Top and Mid tie, but I wouldn't trust me bot so...

Jungle/Top/Mid?
I'm a support main but my second role is jungle. Add me, I am on pretty much everyday so don't worry about that.
adc/mid but i am fine with any role needed

Not sure i can play daily due to work etc but would be good to be part of a team.

Support and jungle are my preferred roles
Not sure, anytime the team is online, probably let people solo queue during the day and in the evenings play as a team.

adc/jungle.
but i can mid/jungle or w/e just to get the spot.

active times?
